timeline.bodyText: Can we assume that the version will be 0.0.0, for all the lang libs? or do we have a way to extract the bundled versions from the distribution itself, instead?

replies.bodyText: @NipunaRanasinghe yeah. This is to avoid directory searching and pre load. But in future will have to find a dynamic way for doing this
